description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Oran, Algeria. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Oran Bay Managed By Accor
hotels.title: Elegant Algeria Beachside Retreat in Oran Bay with Mediterranean Sea Views
hotels.description: In the heart of Oran's thriving city centre, a stone's throw from the picturesque Mediterranean coast, lies a luxurious retreat that encapsulates the rich history and vibrant culture of Algeria's second-largest city. This five-star sanctuary,offers an ideal base to explore the captivating Santa Cruz Fortress, or wander the bustling streets of the Quartier de Sidi El Houari. Indulge in Hotel Oran Bay's excellent facilities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a tranquil spa offering rejuvenating treatments. Savour authentic Algerian cuisine at the onsite Le Canastel restaurant or venture out to the nearby Le Theatre d'Oran for a taste of the city's thriving arts scene.

seo.title: Hoteles en Oran - Algeria Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Oran, Algeria con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
